com.entranceplus.craw.crawler

Interface Crawler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Reddit

    public interface Crawler
    Crawler interface which contains methods for parsing of a website...As of now it supports reddit

    • Method Detail

      • getLinksFromReddit

        java.lang.String getLinksFromReddit(java.lang.String subreddit)
        Get the top links from a subreddit
        Parameters:
        subreddit - - The subreddit of the form Ex. soccer
        Returns:
        JSON string of the form {'subreddit': [list of links corresponding to subreddit]}

      • getSubreddits

        java.lang.String getSubreddits()
        Get the subreddits with corresponding followers and subreddit
        Returns:
        JSON string of the form {'reddits':[{'followers':'344343','subreddit':"/r/politics/"}....]}
